My guess is that some of the people who don't respond have blocked email 
from gladiator@egroups.com. Some folk just can't be bothered to manually 
remove themselves from the list.

Shayd, I tried running the Gladiator: Beyond Freedom demo, but after I tried 
to start a new game or continue, the program ended. Is this supposed to 
happen? From the looks of the files in that ZIP, some of us could cobble 
together a decent set of playable levels... assuming that the basic code 
works. It might need some minor (or serious, I don't know) straightening 
out, which is beyond me at this point. Soon I'll have learned LPC and C++... 
what are Glad and G:BF written in?
            -Tevildo, Prince of Cats.
